attributes.action: have Katey Barber jailed with keys thrown away
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Katey Barber, the bunny burner, should be jailed with the keys thrown away. There should be an indefinite sentence on her, an example must be made the animal torturers, the same way it would for human torturers.

Any scientist can tell you an animals brain works like a human brain, even more so, with fear, pain and suffering.

We, the public, would like to see her jailed, and would like the key to be thrown away.

rejection.details: Individual sentences are a matter for the courts, who are independent of Government.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
